lines.text: Psst... Steve... What does, uh, what does "moon" mean in Greek?
We were standing there on the balcony, all I said was "moon," and she slapped a pair of lips on me like an oxygen mask.
You're hysterical! She probably just brushed by you accidentally.
I may be the all-American schnook, but I know the difference between being brushed, and vacuumed.
No, I tell you, it was the same dream. I was sitting in the middle of the railroad tracks, and these two freight trains are coming at me from either side.
Kid, you always been so hysterical?
Only for the past 15 years. Before that I was gay and carefree, I was...

[cutting him off]
Yes, yes, yes... Well, I tell you. Usually booze is the only treatment for that. Only now, I think you need a cure for the treatment.

[continues]
I tell you what *I* do when I get bugged. I close my eyes, and I try to think of the worst thing that can happen to me. I imagine the whole thing happening. Then - snap - the whole thing is out of my system. Try it. Try it, try it!
Tony, I think I ought to tell you about a rule that I have.
I never do business with relatives. So long, uncle...
I just don't like aggressive women, that's all.
